verses.verse: <S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> my <S%H5869>eye<s%> has <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> [this,] My <S%H241>ear<s%> has <S%H8085>heard<s%> and <S%H995>understood<s%> it.
<S%H1847>"What<s%> you <S%H3045>know<s%> I <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1847>know.<s%> I am not <S%H5307>inferior<s%> to you.
"But I would <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%> And I <S%H2654>desire<s%> to <S%H3198>argue<s%> with <S%H410>God.<s%>
"But you <S%H2950>smear<s%> with <S%H8267>lies;<s%> You are <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H457>worthless<s%> <S%H7495>physicians.<s%>
<S%H4310>"O<s%> that you would be <S%H2790>completely<s%> <S%H2790>silent,<s%> And that it would <S%H1961>become<s%> your <S%H2451>wisdom!<s%>
<S%H4994>"Please<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H9640>argument,<s%> And <S%H7181>listen<s%> to the <S%H7379>contentions<s%> of my <S%H8193>lips.<s%>
"Will you <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H9390>what<s%> is <S%H9390>unjust<s%> for <S%H410>God,<s%> And <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7423>what<s%> is <S%H7423>deceitful<s%> for Him?
"Will you <S%H5375>show<s%> <S%H6440>partiality<s%> <S%H5375><s%> for Him? Will you <S%H7378>contend<s%> for <S%H410>God<s%>?
"Will it be <S%H2896>well<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> He <S%H2713>examines<s%> you? <S%H518>Or<s%> will you <S%H8524>deceive<s%> Him as one <S%H8524>deceives<s%> a <S%H582>man<s%>?
"He will <S%H3198>surely<s%> <S%H3198>reprove<s%> you, <S%H518>If<s%> you <S%H5643>secretly<s%> <S%H5375>show<s%> <S%H6440>partiality.<s%> <S%H5375><s%>
"Will not His <S%H7613>majesty<s%> <S%H1204>terrify<s%> you, And the <S%H6343>dread<s%> of Him <S%H5307>fall<s%> on you?
"Your <S%H2146>memorable<s%> <S%H2146>sayings<s%> are <S%H4912>proverbs<s%> of <S%H665>ashes,<s%> Your <S%H1354>defenses<s%> are <S%H1354>defenses<s%> of <S%H2563>clay.<s%>
"Be <S%H2790>silent<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> me so that I may <S%H1696>speak;<s%> Then let <S%H5674>come<s%> on me <S%H4100>what<s%> may.
<S%H5921>"Why<s%> <S%H4100><s%> should I <S%H5375>take<s%> my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in my <S%H8127>teeth,<s%> And <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H5315>life<s%> in my <S%H3709>hands<s%>?
<S%H2005>"Though<s%> He <S%H6991>slay<s%> me, I will <S%H3176>hope<s%> in Him. <S%H389>Nevertheless<s%> I will <S%H3198>argue<s%> my <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> Him.
<S%H1931>"This<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> will be my <S%H3444>salvation,<s%> For a <S%H2611>godless<s%> <S%H2611>man<s%> may not <S%H935>come<s%> before His <S%H6440>presence.<s%>
<S%H8085>"Listen<s%> <S%H8085>carefully<s%> to my <S%H4405>speech,<s%> And let my <S%H262>declaration<s%> [fill] your <S%H241>ears.<s%>
<S%H2009>"Behold<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> I have <S%H6186>prepared<s%> my <S%H4941>case;<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> that I will be <S%H6663>vindicated.<s%>
<S%H4310>"Who<s%> will <S%H7378>contend<s%> with me? For <S%H6258>then<s%> I would be <S%H2790>silent<s%> and <S%H1478>die.<s%>
<S%H389>"Only<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8147>things<s%> do not <S%H6213>do<s%> to me, <S%H227>Then<s%> I will not <S%H5641>hide<s%> from Thy face: <S%H6440><s%>
<S%H7368>Remove<s%> Thy <S%H3709>hand<s%> from me, And let not the <S%H367>dread<s%> of Thee <S%H1204>terrify<s%> me.
"Then <S%H7121>call,<s%> and I will <S%H6030>answer;<s%> <S%H176>Or<s%> let me <S%H1696>speak,<s%> then <S%H7725>reply<s%> to me.
<S%H4100>"How<s%> <S%H4100>many<s%> are my <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> and <S%H9128>sins<s%>? <S%H3045>Make<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> to me my <S%H6588>rebellion<s%> and my <S%H9128>sin.<s%>
<S%H4100>"Why<s%> dost Thou <S%H5641>hide<s%> Thy <S%H6440>face,<s%> And <S%H2803>consider<s%> me Thine <S%H340>enemy<s%>?
"Wilt Thou <S%H6206>cause<s%> a <S%H5086>driven<s%> <S%H5929>leaf<s%> to <S%H6206>tremble<s%>? Or wilt Thou <S%H7291>pursue<s%> the <S%H3002>dry<s%> <S%H7179>chaff<s%>?
"For Thou dost <S%H3789>write<s%> <S%H4846>bitter<s%> <S%H4846>things<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me, And dost make me to <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of my <S%H5271>youth.<s%>

"Thou dost <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> in the <S%H5465>stocks,<s%> And dost <S%H8104>watch<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H734>paths;<s%> Thou dost <S%H2707>set<s%> a <S%H2707>limit<s%> for the <S%H8328>soles<s%> of my <S%H7272>feet,<s%>
While I am <S%H1086>decaying<s%> like a <S%H7538>rotten<s%> <S%H7538>thing,<s%> Like a <S%H899>garment<s%> that is moth-eaten.
